title: Website & Raspberry Pi — Live Demos
description: Student teams present the club website and a Raspberry Pi game demo, with Q&A and next steps.

title: Club Expansion & Social Media Merge
description: Rockhampton leadership outline plans; align operations and unify social media across campuses.

title: Advisory Committee Setup (Alumni/Staff Mentors)
description: Create a non-executive advisory group of alumni/staff to mentor projects and strengthen continuity.

title: EOI → Members Virtual Meet-Up
description: Welcome new members, introduce active projects and form interest groups.

title: Tech Exhibition — Projects Showcase
description: Showcase student projects (Pi, Web, AI/ML, Cybersecurity). Invite alumni, staff and industry guests.

title: General Meeting (Post-AGM follow-up)
description: Follow-up from AGM; planning workshops, hackathon prep, and committee actions.

title: Monthly Coding Workshop
description: Hands-on coding session; bring a laptop. First Tuesday each month.

title: Monthly Member Meet-Up
description: Community catch-up, lightning talks and project stand-ups. First Wednesday each month.

title: Guest Speaker & Alumni Connect
description: Industry insights and alumni networking. Also runs in Jan & Mar (first Friday).

title: Annual Hackathon (Weekend)
description: Build innovative solutions in teams; prizes and a Sunday showcase.

title: Rockhampton Expansion — Informal Meeting
description: Discussion with Ben Woods and Anshul Bairy about leading the Rockhampton chapter.

title: Orientation Week Stalls (EOIs & Welcome)
description: Meet new students, collect EOIs (100+ so far) and boost student experience & retention.
